angel.welcome: Welcome to my portfolio as Electronic Engineer and Full-Stack developer!

aboutme.aboutme-text: I am a student of Industrial and Automatic Electronic Engineering at the Polytechnic University of Valencia, Spain. In addition to that, I am passionate about software development. For over 4 years, I have been dedicated to programming websites and mobile applications.
aboutme.ambitions-text: Although I already have knowledge in various programming languages related to Frontend development, I continue to study and work on projects in order to improve. Furthermore, I have knowledge in Backend development, which allows me to create much more comprehensive applications. The technologies related to Electronics and Control enable me to work in various areas within my field based on demand.
